MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK5 postcode area of Larbert. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3.45pm to carry out a repair to an underground cable fault near to Rae Street substation and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 00.30am. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.20pm on Wednesday 20th January 2021.
